question: 借金
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>money</kanji> (and <kanji>gold</kanji>) you <kanji>borrow</kanji> is your <vocabulary>debt</vocabulary>. Be sure to pay it back before the yakuza come for you.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The <ja>しゃく</ja> gets shortened to <ja>しゃっ</ja> though, so beware. Just think of that like the little bit that you lost to the yakuza, because they weren't happy you didn't pay back your debt. *cut*
